s0041: Now wang with defeat perish walk Hu, not have big crime, urgent self return!'
s0042: Han Wang Xin report said: 'Bi Xia pick pu rise li xiang, south face call gu, this pu lucky.'
s0043: Xing Yang affairs, pu cannot die, prisoner at Xiang Ji, this one crime.
s0044: Reach bandit attack Ma Yi, pu cannot firm guard, with city descend it, this two crime.
s0045: Now rebel become bandit jiang troops, with jiang jun contend one morning life, this three crime.
s0046: Fu Zhong, Li no one crime, body death perish;
s0047: Now pu have three crime at bi xia, yet desire seek live at world, this Wu Zi Xu so dun at Wu.
s0048: Now pu perish hide mountain valley jian, dawn dusk beg lend Man Yi, pu think return, like cripple not forget rise, blind not forget see, power not able ear.'
s0050: Chai jiang jun slaughter Can He, cut Han Wang Xin.
s0051: Xin enter Xiong Nu, with crown prince both;
s0052: Reach reach Peng Dang city, give birth son, because name said Peng Dang.
s0053: Han crown prince also give birth son, life said Ying.
s0054: Reach Xiao Wen fourteen years, Peng Dang and Ying lead their crowd descend Han.
s0055: Han seal Peng Dang become Gong Gao hou, Ying become Xiang Cheng hou.
s0056: Wu Chu army time, Gong Gao hou merit crown various jiang.
s0057: Transmit son reach grandson, grandson no son, lose hou.
s0058: Ying grandson with not respect lose hou.
s0059: Peng Dang bastard grandson Han Yan, noble fortunate, name rich manifest at dang world.
s0060: His brother Shuo, again seal, number call jiang jun, die become An Dao hou.
